First Sovereign King of Bengal

The first great and independent ruler of Gauda (Bengal). He made Karnasuvarna (Murshidabad) his capital.

тЪФя╕П
Harsha's Rival

A bitter enemy of Harshavardhana. He treacherously murdered Rajyavardhana and is (disputably) accused of felling the Bodhi tree at Bodh Gaya.

Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Religion: Staunch Shaivite. Coins depict Shiva and Nandi.
  • Significance: Sometimes credited with the initiation of the Bengali calendar (Bangabda).
